曰：¶

彼故使彼。¶	KR2c0021_103:78b:2:7:2,KR3k0045_057:5b:7:6:3,KR5c0051_010:15a:7:1:5,KR5c0126_032:2a:43:1:15,KR5c0127_097:006b:10:5:19,KR5c0127_097:011a:5:11:19,KR5c0127_097:012a:6:4:36,KR5c0128_031:013b:1:4:3,KR5c0128_031:014a:9:5:3,KR5c0128_031:014b:8:3:3,KR5c0135_026:011b:2:4:15,KR5c0136_019:009a:9:4:11,KR5c0138_010:11a:1:16:3,KR5c0139_034:008b:3:1:11,KR5h0057_008:002b:10:5:3,KR5i0036_005:05p056b:4:4:23,KR6q0200_008:0340a:8:4:5,KR6q0219_003:0050c:16:7:311
夫人以己為有以異於人以賤其親，¶	KR5c0126_032:2a:44:1:15
齊人之井飲者	KR2c0021_103:78b:3:4:2,KR3k0045_057:5b:8:3:3,KR4c0045_006:16a:6:28:41,KR4c0046_006:12a:6:3:21,KR5c0051_010:15b:1:1:5,KR5c0126_032:2a:45:1:15,KR5c0127_097:007a:1:6:19,KR5c0127_097:009b:8:16:19,KR5c0128_031:013b:2:5:3,KR5c0135_026:011b:3:5:15,KR5c0136_019:009a:10:5:11,KR5c0138_010:11a:3:25:3,KR5c0139_034:009a:5:1:11,KR5h0057_008:003a:1:6:3,KR5i0036_005:05p056b:7:7:23,KR6q0200_008:0340a:9:1:5
相捽也。¶

# src: ZHUANG 32.2.4 Guo Qingfan 1043; Wang Shumin 1259; Fang Yong 856; Chen Guying i34
# dating: 8110
故曰：今之世皆緩也，¶	KR2c0021_103:78b:3:13:2,KR3k0045_057:5b:8:12:3,KR5c0126_032:2a:46:1:16,KR5c0127_097:007a:1:15:19,KR5c0128_031:013b:2:14:3,KR5c0135_026:011b:3:17:15,KR5c0136_019:009a:10:14:11,KR5c0138_010:11a:4:1:3,KR5c0139_034:009a:5:10:11,KR5h0057_008:003a:1:16:3,KR5i0036_005:05p056b:7:16:23,KR6q0200_008:0340a:9:10:5
自是
有德者以不知也，¶	KR5c0051_010:15b:5:3:5,KR5c0126_032:2a:47:3:16,KR5c0127_097:007a:2:8:19,KR5c0128_031:013b:3:7:3,KR5c0135_026:011b:4:9:15,KR5c0136_019:009b:1:7:12,KR5c0138_010:11a:5:30:3,KR5c0139_034:009b:6:3:12,KR5i0036_005:05p056b:9:24:23
而況有道者乎！¶	KR2c0021_103:78b:4:9:2,KR5c0051_010:15b:5:10:5,KR5c0095_008:006a:3:15:8,KR5c0126_032:2a:48:1:16,KR5c0127_097:007a:2:15:19,KR5c0128_007:006b:4:16:3,KR5c0128_031:013b:3:14:3,KR5c0135_026:011b:4:16:15,KR5c0136_019:009b:1:14:12,KR5c0138_010:11a:6:3:3
古者謂之遁天之刑。¶	KR1d0051_058:26b:3:17:8,KR2c0021_083:41b:2:1:1,KR2c0021_103:78b:4:15:2,KR3k0058_107:5a:3:40:2,KR4c0006_003:85b:8:30:62,KR4d0079_002:6a:5:18:10,KR5c0105_001:019a:7:10:5,KR5c0126_003:2a:90:1:12,KR5c0126_032:2a:49:1:16,KR5c0127_005:001a:9:11:2,KR5c0127_097:008b:9:15:19,KR5c0128_004:009a:2:11:4,KR5c0128_031:013b:4:3:3,KR5c0134_001:016b:5:11:29,KR5c0135_004:005b:8:1:9,KR5c0135_026:011b:5:5:15,KR5c0136_003:004b:3:10:6,KR5c0136_019:009b:2:3:12,KR5c0138_002:4a:4:24:2,KR5c0138_010:11a:7:2:3,KR5c0139_004:014b:8:1:18,KR5c0139_034:010a:2:1:12,KR5h0057_001:051a:2:11:53,KR5h0057_008:003a:3:5:3,KR5i0036_002:02p030a:5:18:11,KR5i0036_005:05p056b:10:4:23,KR6s0075_003:0403a:1:5:11

# src: ZHUANG 32.2.5 Guo Qingfan 1045; Wang Shumin 1259; Fang Yong 856; Chen Guying i34
# dating: 8110
聖人安其所安，不安其所不安；¶	KR2b0017_075:4a:3:14:1,KR5c0047_003:002a:3:1:2,KR5c0051_010:16a:1:1:5,KR5c0079_008:006a:1:12:2,KR5c0126_032:2a:50:1:17,KR5c0127_097:007a:3:12:19,KR5c0128_031:015a:4:1:3,KR5c0135_026:012b:2:1:16,KR5c0136_019:010a:3:1:12,KR5c0138_010:11a:7:29:3,KR5c0139_034:010a:7:1:12,KR5h0057_008:003b:10:1:4,KR5i0036_005:05p057a:1:16:23
眾人安其所不安，不安其所安。	KR5c0126_032:2a:51:1:17,KR5i0036_005:05p057a:1:28:23

# src: ZHUANG 32.2.6 Guo Qingfan 1045; Wang Shumin 1263; Fang Yong 858; Chen Guying i34

<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_032-4a>¶
莊子曰：¶
「知道易，¶
勿言難。¶

故无兵；¶

# dating: 8110
